mapper.sql: select aum.id, aum.user_id, aum.brand_id, mb.brand_name as brand_name, IFNULL(u.name, u.phone) as user_name, aum.mining_user_name, aum.api_code, aum.management_fee_rate, aum.estimated_today_income, aum.total_income, aum.yesterday_income, aum.status, aum.create_time, aum.update_time from app_user_miner aum left join miner_brand mb on aum.brand_id = mb.id left join app_user u on aum.user_id = u.id
mapper.insert: insert into app_user_miner(user_id, brand_id, mining_user_name, api_code, management_fee_rate, estimated_today_income, total_income, yesterday_income, status) values(#{userId}, #{brandId}, #{miningUserName}, #{apiCode}, #{managementFeeRate}, #{estimatedTodayIncome}, #{totalIncome}, #{yesterdayIncome}, #{status})
